entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning late this evening then changing to snow after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Light snow over southern sections in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023
